mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(TPQ.NO) FROM TBL_PRJ_QNA TPQ JOIN TBL_PRJ PRJ ON PRJ.NO = TPQ.REF_PRJ_NO JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM1 on TPQ.REF_MEMBER_NO = TM1.NO JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM2 ON PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = TM2.NO LEFT JOIN TBL_SPONSORED_PRJ TSP on PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = TSP.REF_MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_PAYMENT_HISTORY TPH on TSP.NO = TPH.REF_SPONSORED_PRJ_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_PAYMENT TP ON TP.CODE = TPH.REF_PAYMENT_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_PRJ_QNA_ANSWER TPQA ON TPQA.PRJ_QNA_CODE = TPQ.NO WHERE PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = #{userNo}
AND TPQ.CONTENT IS NULL
AND TPQ.CONTENT IS NOT NULL
AND PRJ.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' -- AND PRJ.TITLE = ${search}
AND TM1.ID LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND TPQ.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND TM1.PHONE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND TPQ.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND TP.PAYMENT_TYPE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, TPQ.NO AS TBL_PRJ_QNA_NO, TM1.ID AS TBL_MEMBER_ID, TM1.NAME AS TBL_MEMBER_NAME, PRJ.TITLE AS TBL_PRJ_TITLE, TPQ.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_QNA_CONTENT, TM1.PHONE AS TBL_MEMBER_PHONE, TPQ.REGIST_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_QNA_REGIST_DATE, TP.AMOUNT AS TBL_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, TP.PAYMENT_TYPE AS TBL_PAYMENT_PAYMENT_TYPE, TP.STATUS AS TBL_PAYMENT_STATUS, -- TM2.NAME AS TBL_MEMBER_NAME2, TPQA.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_QNA_ANSWER_CONTENT FROM TBL_PRJ_QNA TPQ JOIN TBL_PRJ PRJ ON PRJ.NO = TPQ.REF_PRJ_NO JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM1 on TPQ.REF_MEMBER_NO = TM1.NO JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM2 ON PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = TM2.NO LEFT JOIN TBL_SPONSORED_PRJ TSP on PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = TSP.REF_MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_PAYMENT_HISTORY TPH on TSP.NO = TPH.REF_SPONSORED_PRJ_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_PAYMENT TP ON TP.CODE = TPH.REF_PAYMENT_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_PRJ_QNA_ANSWER TPQA ON TPQA.PRJ_QNA_CODE = TPQ.NO WHERE TM2.NO = #{userNo}
AND TPQ.CONTENT IS NULL
AND TPQ.CONTENT IS NOT NULL
AND PRJ.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND TM1.ID LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND TPQ.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND TM1.PHONE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND TPQ.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND TP.PAYMENT_TYPE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
ORDER BY TPQ.REGIST_DATE DESC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}

SELECT TPQ.NO AS TBL_PRJ_QNA_NO, TPQ.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_QNA_CONTENT, TPQ.REGIST_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_QNA_REGIST_DATE, TM2.ID AS TBL_MEMBER_ID, TM2.NAME TBL_MEMBER_NAME, TPQA.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_QNA_ANSWER_CONTENT, TPQA.REGIST_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_QNA_ANSWER_REGIST_DATE, TPQA.NO AS TBL_PRJ_QNA_ANSWER_NO FROM TBL_PRJ_QNA TPQ JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM1 ON TM1.NO = TPQ.REF_MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_PRJ_QNA_ANSWER TPQA ON TPQ.NO = TPQA.PRJ_QNA_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM2 ON TM2.NO = TPQA.REF_MEMBER_NO WHERE TPQ.NO = ${no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRJ_QNA_ANSWER TPQA (TPQA.NO, TPQA.CONTENT, TPQA.REGIST_DATE, TPQA.PRJ_QNA_CODE, TPQA.REF_MEMBER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_PRJ_QNA_ANSWER_NO.nextval, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{no}, ${userNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PRJ_QNA_ANSWER TPQA SET TPQA.CONTENT = #{content} WHERE TPQA.NO = (SELECT TPQA2.NO FROM TBL_PRJ_QNA_ANSWER TPQA2 JOIN TBL_PRJ_QNA TPQ ON TPQ.NO = TPQA2.PRJ_QNA_CODE WHERE TPQ.NO = #{no})
